style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="520" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPJRQgV_aGYBipOiaQ7J-12" value="consumes events from topic<div>and sends them to the event dispatcher</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="200" width="230" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPJRQgV_aGYBipOiaQ7J-13" value="based on the event type,&nbsp;<div>the dispatcher tried to find the appropriate handler</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="335" width="290" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPJRQgV_aGYBipOiaQ7J-14" value="DLQ Producer" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-190" y="120" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPJRQgV_aGYBipOiaQ7J-23" value="Handler fails when it cannot<div>deserialize the event, or when&nbsp;</div><div>something goes wrong&nbsp;<div><div>during the execution of the business logic</div></div></div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry y="375" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPJRQgV_aGYBipOiaQ7J-24" value="The handler will deserialize the event,<div>&nbsp;and execute the (business) logic</div><div>&nbsp;needed for that event to be handled</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="451" width="220" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="kPJRQgV_aGYBipOiaQ7J-27" value="Business logic fails when it cannot<div>handle the event for whatever reason</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry y="540" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 21px; margin-left: 271px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div: in case of failure, produces the failed event to the DLQ

switch.text: in case of failure, produces the failed event to the DLQ

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 441px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 192px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Dispatcher fails when no handler
can handle the incoming event,
or when the handler fails to handle the event

div.div:
consumes events from topic
and sends them to the event dispatcher

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 235px; margin-left: 512px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

div.div:
based on the event type,
the dispatcher tried to find the appropriate handler

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 256px; margin-left: 192px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Handler fails when it cannot
deserialize the event, or when
something goes wrong
during the execution of the business logic

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 361px; margin-left: 512px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The handler will deserialize the event,
and execute the (business) logic
needed for that event to be handled

switch.text: The handler will deserialize the eve...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 421px; margin-left: 192px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

div.div:
Business logic fails when it cannot
handle the event for whatever reason

switch.text: Business logic fails when it cannot...
